title: Leg wound
text: Double damage, the target's land speed is halved and can't swim for 1d4 rounds.

title: Grazing hit
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feet directly away.

title: Vulnerable spot
text: Normal damage and target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% of your choice.

title: Bleeder
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Heart shot
text: Triple damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Deep wound
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1 minute (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Ragged wound
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Sucking chest wound
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Lodged in the Bone
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Pinned arm
text: Double damage and one arm cannot move (DC 15 Str or Medicine to be freed).

title: Punctured lung
text: Double damage and target begins to drown 3 round later. DC 15 Con saving throw save each round to end effect.

title: Ventilated
text: Double damage and 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

title: Hand wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. The target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on all rolls using that hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Pinhole
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Perfect strike
text: Triple Damage.

title: Nerve cluster
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d6 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Str saving throw save% each round to act).

title: Penetrating wound
text: Double damage and ignore damage resistance against bludgeoning, piercing and slashing.

title: Kidney piercing
text: Double damage and target %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 2d4 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Achilles' heel
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Spinal tap
text: Normal damage and the target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attack rolls, saves and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.

title: In a row
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target.

title: Blown back
text: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Appendicitis
text: Double damage and target is poisoned (treat as Oil of Taggit - SRD 209).

title: Javelin catcher
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% if it was from ranged attack.

title: Cheek pierced
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. For the next 1d4 rounds, when casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.

title: Calf hole
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Painful poke
text: Double damage, the target can't take reactions and can only perform an action or a move in the next round.

title: Pierced
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.

title: Tenacious wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target does not heal this damage naturally.

title: Muscles severed
text: Normal damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% and 1d6 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Infection
text: Double damage and target contracts Sewer Plague (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%. SRD 204).

title: Overreaction
text: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.

title: Spun around
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.

title: Eye patch for you
text: Triple damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration. The target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on Perception and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Forearm piercing
text: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.

title: Clean through
text: Normal damage, the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration.

title: Surprise opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage%.

title: Organ scramble
text: Double damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Deep hurting
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Tongue piercing
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. The next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.

title: Shoulder wound
text: Double damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-STR=Str% and %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Left reeling
text: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Elbow pierced
text: Double damage and target drops 1 item being held.

title: Bicep wound
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Nailed in place
text: Double damage and target cannot move (DC 15 Str check negates).

title: Guarded strike
text: Double damage and +2 to your AC for 1 round.

title: Right in the ear
text: Normal damage, the target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on %ABILITY-INT=Intelligence% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Chipped bone
text: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Stinger
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Nicked an artery
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.
